Rulings.Goat:
“Burning Land” may only be activated if there is a Field Spell Card on the field.
●“Burning Land” may destroy a face-down Field Spell card.Judge List Rulings:The field-destruction effect [of Burning Land] is a one-time deal that only happens when the card first resolves. The only continuous effect is the damage it inflicts.
